info.title: Personal Relationships API
info.description: API for management of contacts and their relationships to prisoners including restrictions that apply to the contact or relationship specifically.

tags.name: Contacts
tags.description: APIs relating to creating and managing a contact

tags.name: Prisoner Contact Relationship
tags.description: APIs relating to creating and managing relationships between contacts and prisoners

tags.name: Restrictions
tags.description:
APIs relating to creating and managing restrictions. Two kinds of restrictions are supported in this API

 - Estate wide restrictions, a.k.a global and contact restrictions. These apply to all of a contacts relationships.
 - Prisoner-contact restrictions. These apply to a relationship between a specific prisoner and contact. 
 
There are also restrictions that can apply to a prisoner and all of their relationships but those are not supported by this API.

tags.name: Reference Data
tags.description: APIs relating to reference data used in the service

tags.name: Sync & Migrate
tags.description: APIs relating to data sync and migration with NOMIS

get.summary: Returns the number of children for a prisoner by prisonerNumber
get.description:
Requires role: PERSONAL_RELATIONSHIPS_MIGRATION.
      Used to get the number of children for one prisoner.

400.description: Invalid input data

404.description: No number of children for that prisoner could be found

put.summary: Create or Updates the number of children for a prisoner
put.description:
Requires role: PERSONAL_RELATIONSHIPS_MIGRATION.
      Used to update a prisoner's number of children.

404.description: Prisoner's number of children not found

400.description: Invalid input data

200.description: Successfully created/updated Prisoner's number of children

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

get.summary: Returns the domestic status for a prisoner by prisonerNumber
get.description:
Requires role: PERSONAL_RELATIONSHIPS_MIGRATION.
      Used to get the domestic status for one prisoner.

404.description: No active domestic status found for the requested prisoner.

put.summary: Create or Updates the domestic status for a prisoner
put.description:
Requires role: PERSONAL_RELATIONSHIPS_MIGRATION.
      Used to update a prisoner's domestic status.

400.description: Invalid data provided in the request

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

200.description: Successfully created/updated domestic status for the requested prisoner

404.description: Domestic status not found

get.description:
Get the restrictions that apply for this relationship.
      
      This includes prisoner-contact restrictions for this specific relationship only and any global (estate-wide) restrictions for the contact.
      
      If the prisoner and contact have multiple relationships, the prisoner-contact restrictions for the other relationships will not be returned.

parameters.name: prisonerContactId
parameters.description: The id of the prisoner contact

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

404.description: The Prisoner contact relationship was not found.

post.description: Creates a new prisoner contact restriction for the specified prisoner contact relationship

parameters.name: prisonerContactId
parameters.description: The id of the prisoner contact relationship

404.description: Could not find the the prisoner contact relationship this prisoner contact restriction is for

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

400.description: The request has invalid or missing fields

201.description: Created the prisoner contact restriction successfully

get.description:
Get a contacts global restrictions only. Global restrictions apply to all of a contacts relationships and are known as estate-wide restrictions in NOMIS.

      Additional restrictions between the contact and specific prisoners may also apply.

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

200.description: Found the contact and their restrictions

get.summary: Endpoint to return reference data for a provided group key. Sorted by display order then description by default.

get.summary: Endpoint to fetch all contacts for a specific prisoner by prisoner number and active status

parameters.description: The prison number of the prisoner who's contacts will be returned

parameters.description: Whether to include only active (true) or inactive (false) contacts

200.description: List of all contacts for the prisoner

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

404.description: The Prisoner was not found.

404.description: Could not find the the contact

get.description: Search all contacts by their last name or first name or middle name or date of birth

400.description: Invalid request

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

get.description: Gets all city references

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

get.description: Gets a city reference by their id

404.description: No city reference with that id could be found

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

get.description: Gets a city reference by their nomis code

404.description: No city reference with that nomis code could be found

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

SyncUpdatePrisonerContactRequest.description: Request object to update prisoner contact details

contactId.description: The ID of the prisoner contact

contactType.description:
Coded value indicating either a social or official contact (mandatory).
      This is a coded value from the group code CONTACT_TYPE in reference data.
      Known values are (S) Social or (O) official.

nextOfKin.description: Indicates if the prisoner contact is next of kin

emergencyContact.description: Indicates if the prisoner contact is an emergency contact

comments.description: Additional comments about the prisoner contact

active.description: Indicates if the prisoner contact is active

approvedVisitor.description: Indicates if the prisoner contact is an approved visitor

currentTerm.description: Indicates if this relationship applies to the latest booking

expiryDate.description: The expiry date of the prisoner contact

createdAtPrison.description: The prison where the prisoner contact was created

updatedBy.description: The user who last updated the prisoner contact

updatedTime.description: The timestamp of when the prisoner contact was changed

The title code for the contact.

The gender code for the contact.

addressType.description:
The type of address.

property.description: Building or house number or name

mailFlag.description: Whether the address can be used for mailing

startDate.description: The start date when this address can be considered active from

endDate.description: The end date when this address can be considered active until

noFixedAddress.description: Flag to indicate this address should be considered as no fixed address

emailAddresses.description: List of Nomis and DPS IDs for person email addresses

identities.description: List of Nomis and DPS IDs for person proofs of identity

restrictions.description: List of Nomis and DPS IDs for person restrictions (visitor restrictions)

relationships.description: List of Nomis and DPS IDs for relationships and relationship-specific restrictions

employments.description: List of Nomis and DPS IDs for employments (official contact types only)

CreateContactRequest.description: Request to create a new contact

title.description:
The title code for the contact.
      This is a coded value (from the group code TITLE in reference data).
      Known values are MR, MRS, MISS, DR, MS, REV, SIR, BR, SR.

lastName.description: The last name of the contact

firstName.description: The first name of the contact

middleNames.description: The middle names of the contact, if any

dateOfBirth.description: The date of birth of the contact, if known

relationship.description: A description of the relationship if the contact should be linked to a prisoner

createdBy.description: The id of the user creating the contact

ContactAddressDetails.description: An address related to a contact with descriptions of all reference data

contactAddressId.description: The id of the contact address

addressType.description:
The type of address (optional).
      This is a coded value (from the group code ADDRESS_TYPE in reference data).
      The known values are HOME, WORK or BUS (business address).

addressTypeDescription.description: The description of the address type

primaryAddress.description: True if this is the primary address otherwise false

property.description: Building or house number or name

verified.description: Whether the address has been verified by postcode lookup

verifiedBy.description: Which username ran the postcode lookup check

verifiedTime.description: The timestamp of when the postcode lookup was done

mailFlag.description: Flag to indicate whether mail is allowed to be sent to this address

startDate.description: The start date when this address is to be considered active from

endDate.description: The end date when this address is to be considered no longer active

noFixedAddress.description: Flag to indicate whether this address indicates no fixed address

comments.description: Any additional information or comments about the address

phoneNumbers.description: Phone numbers that are related to this address

createdBy.description: The id of the user who created the contact

createdTime.description: The timestamp of when the contact was created

updatedBy.description: The id of the user who last updated the contact address

updatedTime.description: The timestamp of when the contact address was last updated

ContactCreationResult.description: The result of creating a contact and optionally a new relationship to a prisoner

createdContact.description: The details of a contact as an individual

createdRelationship.description: Describes the prisoner contact relationship if one was created with the contact

ContactDetails.description: The details of a contact as an individual

title.description:
The title code for the contact.
      This is a coded value (from the group code TITLE in reference data).
      Known values are MR, MRS, MISS, DR, MS, REV, SIR, BR, SR.

titleDescription.description: The description of the title code, if present

lastName.description: The last name of the contact

firstName.description: The first name of the contact

middleNames.description: The middle name of the contact, if any

dateOfBirth.description: The date of birth of the contact, if known

isStaff.description: Whether the contact is a staff member

deceasedDate.description: The date the contact deceased, if known

languageCode.description: The NOMIS code for the contacts language

languageDescription.description: The description of the language code

interpreterRequired.description: Whether an interpreter is required for this contact

phoneNumbers.description: All phone numbers for the contact

emailAddresses.description: All email addresses for the contact

domesticStatusCode.description: The NOMIS code for the contacts domestic status

domesticStatusDescription.description: The description of the domestic status code

gender.description: The NOMIS code for the contacts gender. See reference data with group code 'GENDER'

genderDescription.description: The description of gender code. See reference data with group code 'GENDER'

createdBy.description: The id of the user who created the contact

createdTime.description: The timestamp of when the contact was created

CreateContactRestrictionRequest.description: Request to create a new global restriction on a contact, a.k.a an estate-wide restriction

restrictionType.description:
The coded type of restriction that applies to this contact.
    This is a coded value from the group RESTRICTION in reference codes.
    Example values include ACC, BAN, CHILD, CLOSED, RESTRICTED, DIHCON, NONCON.

comments.description: Comments for the restriction

CreatePhoneRequest.description: Request to create a new phone number

CreateIdentityRequest.description: Request to create a new contact identity

identityValue.description: The identity value such as driving licence number

issuingAuthority.description: The authority who issued the identity

CreateEmploymentRequest.description: Request to create a new employment with an employer and whether it is active or inactive

isActive.description: Whether this is a current employment or not

createdBy.description: The id of the user who created the entry

CreateMultipleEmailsRequest.description: Request to create a new email address

CreateEmailRequest.description: Request to create a new email address

CreateContactAddressRequest.description: Request to create a new contact address

addressType.description:
The type of address.
      This is a coded value (from the group code ADDRESS_TYPE in reference data).
      The known values are HOME, WORK or BUS (business address).

primaryAddress.description: True if this is the primary address otherwise false

property.description: Building or house number or name

verified.description: Whether the address has been verified by postcode lookup

mailFlag.description: Whether the address can be used for mailing

startDate.description: The start date when this address can be considered active from

endDate.description: The end date when this address can be considered active until

noFixedAddress.description: Flag to indicate this address should be considered as no fixed address

comments.description: Any additional information or comments about the address

createdBy.description: The id of the user who created the contact

CreateContactAddressPhoneRequest.description: Request to create a new address-linked phone number

contactAddressId.description: Unique identifier for the contact address

UpdateRelationshipRequest.description: Request to update an existing relationship details

relationshipType.description: The code representing the relationship type as social or official

relationshipToPrisoner.description: The relationship reference code between the prisoner and the contact

isEmergencyContact.description: Whether they are the emergency contact for the prisoner

isApprovedVisitor.description: Whether they are approved to visit the prisoner

isNextOfKin.description: Whether they are the next of kin for the prisoner

comments.description: Comments about the contacts relationship with the prisoner

updatedBy.description: The id of the user who updated the contact

PatchContactRequest.description: Request to patch a new contact. firstName and lastName are not updatable so are intentionally missing from this request.

isStaff.description: Whether the contact is a staff member

domesticStatus.description: The domestic status code of the contact

languageCode.description: The language code of the contact

dateOfBirth.description: The date of birth of the contact, if known

title.description: The title code for the contact, if any

middleNames.description: The middle names of the contact, if any

gender.description:
The optional gender code for the contact.
    This is a coded value (from the group code GENDER in reference data).
    Known values are (M) Male, (F) Female, (NK) Not Known, (NS) Not Specified.

deceasedDate.description: The date the contact deceased, if known

updatedBy.description: The id of the user who updated the contact

PatchContactResponse.description: The details of a updated contact as an individual

title.description:
The title code for the contact.
    This is a coded value (from the group code TITLE in reference data).
    Known values are MR, MRS, MISS, DR, MS, REV, SIR, BR, SR.

lastName.description: The last name of the contact

firstName.description: The first name of the contact

middleNames.description: The middle name of the contact, if any

dateOfBirth.description: The date of birth of the contact, if known

isStaff.description: Whether the contact is a staff member

deceasedDate.description: The date the contact was deceased, if applicable

gender.description:
The gender code for the contact.
    This is a coded value (from the group code GENDER in reference data).
    Known values are (M) Male, (F) Female, (NK) Not Known, (NS) Not Specified.

domesticStatus.description: The domestic status code of the contact

languageCode.description: The language code of the contact

createdTime.description: Timestamp when the entry was created

updatedBy.description: User who updated the entry

updatedTime.description: Timestamp when the entry was updated

PatchEmploymentsNewEmployment.description: Request to create a new employment with an employer and whether it is active or inactive

isActive.description: Whether this is a current employment or not

PatchEmploymentsRequest.description: Request allowing several changes to employments in a single request.

createEmployments.description: List of new employments to create

updateEmployments.description: List of updates to apply to existing employments

deleteEmployments.description: List of ids for employments to delete

requestedBy.description: The id of the user requesting the changes. Will become created by for new employments and updated by for updated employments

PatchEmploymentsUpdateEmployment.description: Request to update an existing employment's employer or active flag.

isActive.description: Whether this is a current employment or not

PatchContactAddressRequest.description: Request to patch a contact address

addressType.description:
The type of address.
    This is a coded value (from the group code ADDRESS_TYPE in reference data).
    The known values are HOME, WORK or BUS (business address).

primaryAddress.description: True if this is the primary address otherwise false

property.description: Building or house number or name

cityCode.description: City code - from NOMIS reference data

countyCode.description: County code - from NOMIS reference data

countryCode.description: Country code - from NOMIS reference data

verified.description: Whether the address has been verified by postcode lookup

mailFlag.description: Whether the address can be used for mailing

startDate.description: The start date when this address can be considered active from

endDate.description: The end date when this address can be considered active until

noFixedAddress.description: Flag to indicate this address should be considered as no fixed address

comments.description: Any additional information or comments about the address

updatedBy.description: The id of the user who updated the address

ReferenceCode.description: Describes the details of a reference code

referenceCodeId.description: An internally-generated unique identifier for this reference code.

groupCode.description: The group name for related reference codes.

code.description: The code for this reference data

description.description: A fuller description of the reference code

displayOrder.description: The default order configured for the reference code, lowest number first.

isActive.description: Whether the reference code is still in use. Old reference codes are maintained for compatability with legacy data.

PrisonerContactSummary.description: Describes the details of a prisoner's contact

prisonerContactId.description: The unique identifier for the prisoner contact

contactId.description: The unique identifier for the contact

lastName.description: The last name of the contact

firstName.description: The first name of the contact

middleNames.description: The middle names of the contact, if any

dateOfBirth.description: The date of birth of the contact

relationshipType.description:
Coded value indicating either a social or official contact (mandatory).
      This is a coded value from the group code CONTACT_TYPE in reference data.
      Known values are (S) Social or (O) official.

relationshipTypeDescription.description: The description of the relationship type

relationshipToPrisoner.description: The relationship to the prisoner. A code from SOCIAL_RELATIONSHIP or OFFICIAL_RELATIONSHIP reference data groups depending on the relationship type.

relationshipToPrisonerDescription.description: The description of the relationship to the prisoner

flat.description: Flat number in the address, if any

primaryAddress.description: If true this address should be considered as the primary residential address

mailAddress.description: If true this address should be considered for sending mail to

phoneType.description: Type of the latest phone number

phoneTypeDescription.description: Description of the type of the latest phone number

phoneNumber.description: The latest phone number, if there are any

extNumber.description: The extension number of the latest phone number

approvedVisitor.description: Indicates whether the contact is an approved visitor

nextOfKin.description: Is this contact the prisoner's next of kin?

emergencyContact.description: Is this contact the prisoner's emergency contact?

isRelationshipActive.description: Is this prisoner's contact relationship active?

currentTerm.description: Is this relationship active for the current booking?

comments.description: Any additional comments

PrisonerContactRestrictionsResponse.description: Restriction related to a specific relationship between a prisoner and contact

isoAlpha2.description: ISO Alpha-2 code of the language

isoAlpha3.description: ISO Alpha-3 code of the language

isoLanguageDesc.example: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

isoNumeric.description: ISO numeric code of the country

isoAlpha2.description: ISO Alpha-2 code of the country

isoAlpha3.description: ISO Alpha-3 code of the country

isoCountryDesc.example: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

LinkedPrisonerDetails.description: The details of a prisoner linked to a contact including one or more relationships

lastName.description: The last name of the prisoner

firstName.description: The first name of the prisoner

middleNames.description: The middle names of the prisoner, if any

relationships.description: All the relationships between the prisoner and contact. At least one will be present.

LinkedPrisonerRelationshipDetails.description: Details of the relationship between the prisoner and contact

prisonerContactId.description: The unique identifier for the prisoner contact relationship

relationshipType.description:
Coded value indicating either a social or official contact (mandatory).
      This is a coded value from the group code CONTACT_TYPE in reference data.
      Known values are (S) Social or (O) official.

relationshipTypeDescription.description: The description of the contact relationship type. Description from reference data Official or Social

relationshipToPrisoner.description: The relationship to the prisoner. A code from SOCIAL_RELATIONSHIP or OFFICIAL_RELATIONSHIP reference data groups depending on the relationship type.

dateOfBirth.description: Date of Birth of the contact in ISO format

ContactSearchResultItem.description: The details of a contact as an individual

lastName.description: The last name of the contact

firstName.description: The first name of the contact

middleNames.description: The middle name of the contact, if any

dateOfBirth.description: The date of birth of the contact, if known

createdBy.description: The id of the user who created the contact

createdTime.description: The timestamp of when the contact was created

flat.description: The flat of the contact address, if known

property.description: The property of the contact address, if known

street.description: The street of the contact address, if known

area.description: The area of the contact address, if known

cityCode.description: The city code of the contact address, if known

cityDescription.description: The description of city code, if known

countyCode.description: The county code of the contact address, if known

countyDescription.description: The description of county code, if known

postCode.description: The postcode of the contact address, if known

countryCode.description: The country code of the contact address, if known

countryDescription.description: The description of country code, if known

mailAddress.description: If true this address should be considered for sending mail to

startDate.description: The date from which this address can be considered active

endDate.description: The date after which this address should be considered inactive

noFixedAddress.description: A flag to indicate that this address is effectively no fixed address

comments.description: Any additional information or comments about the address
